data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: Digital files that only contain text are known as text files. Text ____ are a ____ type ____ file ____, and ____ come ____ a variety ____ formats. The ____ format ____ called a ____ text ____, which ____ text ____ no ____ features. Rich ____ format ____ special ____, such ____ different ____ of ____. When a document is opened in the same program in which it was created, it is usually opened in rich text format.
data.partBlankContent: Digital files that only contain text are known as text files. Text fi___ are a com___ type o_ file sto____, and th__ come i_ a variety o_ formats. The simp____ format i_ called a pl___ text fi__, which cont____ text b__ no spe____ features. Rich te__ format sto___ special feat____, such a_ different sty___ of te__. When a document is opened in the same program in which it was created, it is usually opened in rich text format.
data.answer: 只包含文本的数字文件称为文本文件。文本文件是一种常见的文件存储类型，有多种格式。最简单的格式称为纯文本文件，它包含文本但没有特殊功能。富文本格式存储特殊功能，例如不同的文本样式。当在创建文档的同一程序中打开文档时，通常以富文本格式打开。
